email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they are willing to adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 is acceptable. We can proceed with the laycan of 15-20 October. Please confirm the vessel details and send over the charter party for review. Also, could you confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.00 works for you. Yes, the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. I will send over the charter party shortly for your review. The vessel details are as follows: MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We will review the charter party and get back to you by end of day. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Finalization
email_chain.body: Hi John, just following up to see if you had a chance to review the charter party. Let me know if there are any issues or if we can proceed to finalize. Best, Sarah
